Name: Detropolitan
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Yet another twist on the Cosmopolitan.
Nutrition: One serving of Detropolitan contains 145 calories
